name: Afterglow
tagline: A live-coding lighting controller, building on the Open Lighting Architecture with Clojure and bits of Overtone.
body:
### Afterglow GitHub Pages.
This site was created to track versioned copies of the [API documentation](http://rawgit.com/brunchboy/afterglow/master/api-doc/index.html), so that releases could link to consistent documentation, but it turns out that using `rawgit.com` is a better approach, since the code and documentation can be kept in sync simply by virtue of existing within the same branch or tag that way.

Perhaps in the future there will be other content that deserves publishing here, or perhaps it will simply be shut down.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
